channel.title: Project Purity * New Server * VPS Hosted * Need Staff * Zaryte * Dice * Primal
channel.description:
[size=24pt][FONT=Century Gothic][RE-POSTED DUE TO FRIEND NOT HAVING CORRECT CLIENT DOWNLOAD!!!][/FONT][/size]
Hello everybody, Brandon here bringing you Project Purity! This is a brand new server just going live, needing new players and staff! There are many things to do, lots of customs, and an active owner always working to imporve the server. Exp rates are medium, and drop rates aren't impossible like other servers.
[center]-Download- [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/5sc8g8rh3ln6h28/client.jar]client[/url]
-Forums- [url=http://projectpurity.netne.net/]Project Purity - Forums[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jsG3YsF.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cV7zJK6.png[/img]
[size=24pt][b]Great skilling![/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/23AAG4T.png[/img]
[size=24pt][b]3 donor floors. Floor 1- shops[/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wZGkSS9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/inLgaIQ.png[/img]
[size=24pt][b]Floor 2- monsters[/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cE8qQnz.png[/img]
[size=24pt][b]Floor 3- bosses[/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NGnob9c.png[/img]
[b][b][size=24pt]Great solo and duo slayer stores[/size][/b][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/b57hUcB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0fEvjQU.png[/img]
[b][size=24pt]Amazing pkp store[/size][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dcViIWS.png[/img]
[size=24pt][b][b]Point tab[/b][/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0RThssB.png[/img] [/img][/center]
There are many other features, including great pvm, reset combat stats for free, and many more. Join the server now and give it a try :) Work hard for your staff positions and don't beg. Hope to see you on :P

item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

[quote=“Smudgerx360, post:5, topic:545514”][quote author=DevilXsummoner link=topic=664399.msg4441475#msg4441475 date=1406775380]

free host
ip.b
nulled.
[/quote]

Saving for hosting, VPS is active…[/quote]

Slap a httpd on the VPS? If you’re worried about resource usage just use a lightweight one, lighttpd for example.

Read full topic
